data.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot (4K/UHD)(1974)
data.meta_description: Shop Thunderbolt and Lightfoot (4K/UHD)(1974) at Target. Choose from Same Day Delivery, Drive Up or Order Pickup. Free standard shipping with $35 orders.
data.text: While on the run from the ex-partners who think he made off with the loot from their last job, heist artist John "Thunderbolt" Doherty (Clint Eastwood) makes an eager apprentice out of young drifter/thief Lightfoot (Jeff Bridges). The newbie winds up brokering a truce between Doherty and his pursuers-by proposing a do-over of the botched robbery. Exciting debut feature from Michael Cimino co-stars George Kennedy, Geoffrey Lewis, Gary Busey, Catherine Bach. 115 min. Widescreen (Enhanced); Soundtracks: English DTS 5.1, DTS Lossless stereo; Subtitles: English; audio commentary; featurette; radio spots; TV spots; theatrical trailer. Two-disc set.
